meanings.definition: A group of peptides that cause blood vessels to dilate and lower blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The bradykinins in my body helped widen my blood vessels.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study bradykinins to understand how they affect blood pressure.
meanings.sent3: The bradykinins decided to throw a party in my veins, making them wider!
meanings.sent4: The bradykinins were like little architects, designing wider roads for the blood to flow.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the bradykinins as tiny keys unlocking the doors of my blood vessels.

meanings.definition: A type of protein that plays a role in inflammation and pain perception.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating how bradykinins contribute to inflammation.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes experience pain due to the release of bradykinins.
meanings.sent3: The bradykinins were having a heated argument with the pain receptors.
meanings.sent4: In my mind, bradykinins were like little messengers delivering pain signals.
meanings.sent5: The presence of bradykinins made the inflammation feel like a fiery dragon inside me.
